article_title: Mead says a special session unlikely, Medicaid expansion could have helped miners, drillers

og.description: Some of Wyoming’s unemployed energy workers would now be eligible for health coverage if the state had expanded Medicaid to low-income Wyomingites, Gov. Matt Mead said.
